page.title: 03Population,S'key & C'thorpe.
page.content:
Majority lives within Stiffkey village; Parish electorate: 209 persons (excludes those under 18, new-comers not yet on roll, 'week-enders'). Cockthorpe resident adult population: 16.
{Local population:} great number of inhabitants have or had parents or grand-parents, on at least one side, from Stffkey or Cockthorpe; but more outsiders are moving in.
{Aged and aging:}about half the population nearing, around or past retirement age.
{Young population:}vigorous but few teen-age and young children.
